author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...CARLOTTA BECOMES A POST-TROPICAL CYCLONE... ...THIS IS THE LAST ADVISORY...
summary:
...CARLOTTA BECOMES A POST-TROPICAL CYCLONE... ...THIS IS THE LAST ADVISORY...
 As of 8:00 PM PDT Mon Aug 5
 the center of Carlotta was located near 20.6, -128.5
 with movement W at 8 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1003 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.
